ABOUT.TITLE: Why me
ABOUT.TEXT_PART1: I bring a strong passion for web development and combine creative design with technical implementation. My focus is currently on frontend development, where I have already gained practical experience in implementing modern, user-friendly and responsive interfaces.
ABOUT.TEXT_PART2: To complete my profile, I am currently taking backend training, which will enable me to develop complex server-side logic, database connections and interfaces in the future. This way, I combine a deep understanding of the entire web architecture ‚Äì from appealing UI to performant backend logic.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

EL_POLLO_LOCO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: Your privacy is important to me. This statement explains how I collect and use your personal data.

DATA.TEXT: I collect only the data you provide via contact form (name, email, message) and anonymized analytics data for improvements.

COOKIE.TEXT: This site uses cookies for basic functionality and Google Analytics. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

RIGHTS.TEXT: You have the right to access, rectify, or erase your personal data at any time. Please contact me if you wish to exercise these rights.

PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: If you have questions about this policy, please contact me at nuri.toker@yahoo.com.

CONTACT.HEADING: Contact me
CONTACT.INTRO: Are you looking for support in web development? Contact me ‚Äì together we will advance your project.
